channel.title: Comments on: Giving New Meaning to “Backwards Compatible”

item.title: By: Foton
item.dc:creator: Foton
item.description: In a bitter twist of irony, the low-pop players could start begging to transfer to the newly invigorated hi-pop servers. That'll learn us for snickering about your problems these past few months.
item.content:encoded: In a bitter twist of irony, the low-pop players could start begging to transfer to the newly invigorated hi-pop servers. That’ll learn us for snickering about your problems these past few months.

item.title: By: Anon
item.dc:creator: Anon
item.description: Ouch - the new hardware on the damned batch of servers seems to be working nicely. Maybe they'll have to revamp the rest in the same fashion then . . .
item.content:encoded: Ouch – the new hardware on the damned batch of servers seems to be working nicely. Maybe they’ll have to revamp the rest in the same fashion then . . .
